title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Weather              Weather         NPS photo  Summer: Daytime highs in the mid to upper 90's F (38 C) and night time lows near 70 F (16 C). Late summer afternoons often bring sudden thunderstorms, so an umbrella or rain gear could be helpful.    Â      NPS image  Winter: Daytime highs around 40 F (4 C), and night time lows in the teens (- 10 C). Occasional snow.
